description:
Mishima has been concerned since Miharu went to the hospital and visits her every day. Honda and Mami are naturally worried about Miharu as well, but they`re also concerned about Mishima. One day, Miharu`s mother explains to Mishima the events surrounding that day from his childhood. What is the truth behind the memory Mishima has treasured since he was a boy?
Source: crunchyroll
